inline.description:
On a server with various plugins installed:
  1. Main Menu âžœ System Console âžœ Search box
  2. Type the first few letters of a plugin you know exists on the server
  3. Repeat once or twice more
inline.expectedResult: • The relevant plugin is highlighted in the left-hand-side under PLUGINS (BETA)
